bwwExcerpt: As Pinter himself once said to an actor when asked about the play's meaning, "I don't know. Just play it." That model of icy intelligence and elegance, Eve Best, certainly plays it, and is the dominant force in Roundabout's suitably indecipherable revival of his 1971 triangle tease. She is very ably joined by Clive Owen and Kelly Reilly, both making their Broadway debuts...Owen's Deeley is the kind of confident alpha-male whose cockiness is smirk-worthy to Best's coolly manipulative Anna. Reilly
